title: Course Enrollment Ranking
description: Write a query to rank courses by the number of enrolled students. Display course_name, department, and student_count. Only include courses with at least 1 student, ordered by student count descending.
hint: Join courses with enrollments, GROUP BY course, use HAVING to filter, ORDER BY count.
solution: SELECT courses.course_name, courses.department, COUNT(enrollments.student_id) as student_count FROM courses INNER JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY courses.course_name, courses.department HAVING COUNT(enrollments.student_id) >= 1 ORDER BY student_count DESC
